PLAHIS Planning Application Reference: DM2022/00063--- Address: Opposite 156 Beddington LaneBeddington--- Proposal: Prior Approval for the erection of a 20m high monopole mast with wrapround Cabinet at base, 3 separate equipment cabinets and associated ancillary works on land to the front Prologis Park unit DC2C.--- Status: ARPR--- Decision: ARPR--- Date Decision Issued: 23-MAR-22---

PLAHIS Planning Application Reference: DM2018/02044--- Address: Former Sludge Beds To The West Of Beddington Lane And Land To The Rear Of 79-93 Beddington Lane, Beddington.--- Proposal: Redevelopment of former sludge beds to provide four industrial units providing 20,746 sqm of industrial floorspace (Use Class B1c/B2/B8) and ancillary officers together with 186 car parking spaces, 12 disability spaces and 23 HGV spaces, new access and landscaping.  Restoration of former sludge bed to the north of Mile Road to create a new ecology area.--- Status: GTD--- Decision: GTD--- Date Decision Issued: 19-AUG-19---

PLAHIS Planning Application Reference: DM2020/00142--- Address: Former Sludge Beds To The West Of Beddington Lane And Land To The Rear Of 79-93 Beddington Lane, Beddington.--- Proposal: Non material amendment to approved application DM2018/02044 which allowed the 'Redevelopment of former sludge beds to provide four industrial units providing 20,746 sqm of industrial floorspace (Use Class B1c/B2/B8) and ancillary officers together with 186 car parking spaces, 12 disability spaces and 23 HGV spaces, new access and landscaping.  Restoration of former sludge bed to the north of Mile Road to create a new ecology area' to allow for the rewording of condition 31 from prior to commencement to prior to occupation and alterations to elevations of the commercial units, namely additional glazing to unit DC4 east elevation, reconfigured glazing/cladding to unit DC3 south elevation and required corrections to sizing of the level access doors to units DC1 and DC2.--- Status: GTD--- Decision: GTD--- Date Decision Issued: 26-FEB-20---

site_name: Beddington Farms Landfill Tipping Site At
description: Non material amendment to approved application DM2018/02044 (as amended by Non-Material Amendments refs: DM2020/00142 and DM2020/01554) which allowed the 'Redevelopment of former sludge beds to provide four industrial units providing 20,746 sqm of industrial floorspace (Use Class B1c/B2/B8) and ancillary officers together with 186 car parking spaces, 12 disability spaces and 23 HGV spaces, new access and landscaping.  Restoration of former sludge bed to the north of Mile Road to create a new ecology area.' to allow for the conversion of three parking spaces on the south western corner of the site into a landscaped outdoor amenity area servicing DC3 industrial unit.
